activities: Enjoy premium sushi made by an elderly chef
location_info.location_summary: Wakana Sushi in Higashi-Nagasaki, Tokyo, is a charming sushi restaurant run by an 80-year-old grandmother who prepares every dish herself.
location_info.vicinity: 99/1 Industrial Ring Road, Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa

related_places.location_summary: Sukiyabashi Jiro is a prestigious sushi restaurant in Tokyo known for its meticulous preparation and the skill of its chef, Jiro Ono.
